thread.title: 2015 Epcot® Candlelight Processional Dinner Packages Now Available
thread.title_full: 2015 Epcot® Candlelight Processional Dinner Packages Now Available

author: Off to Neverland Travel
title: 2015 Epcot® Candlelight Processional Dinner Packages Now Available
text:
Request a Quote 2015 Epcot® Candlelight Processional Dinner Packages Now Available 
Advance Dining Reservations (ADRs) for the 2015 Epcot® Candlelight Processional Dinner packages opened to the public this morning. These dinner packages pair a delicious lunch or dinner at select Epcot® table service restaurants with 2 holiday shows that will leave you in awe! 
After enjoying your meal, you will receive a pass for reserved seating for one of that evening’s Candlelight Processionals showings. The Candlelight Processional – a joyous retelling of the Christmas story performed by a celebrity narrator, a 50-piece orchestra, and a mass choir – is one of the most beloved holiday traditions at the Walt Disney World® Resort. Show times take place 3 times each day, except on December 6, 2015 when show times take place at 6:45 PM and 8:15 PM only. 
Dinner packages are available for the following Epcot® restaurants: Biergarten Restaurant
